data.text: @lauradeornelas Response times may vary depending on the required research and internal investigations. As such, we humbly request for your patience in this matter. In the meantime, as per earlier advise you may contact the Lost and Found desk of your arrival airport regarding your baggage.

data.text: @lauradeornelas Hi, my sincerest apologies in delayed response and for the inconvenience caused. Please note that we can only trace your baggage using the baggage tracker number or the case reference number that you are provided upon filing your report with the Lost and Found desk.

Kind regards, Noah.
